ComicInfo.Summary:
Tempers flare as the New Authority face their first challenge; a threat of their own making so big, it endangers the power structure of the entire world. The New Authority has one chance to make things right, and if they don't, the people who decided to get rid of the original Authority might just decide it's time for history to repeat itself.
Includes an 8 page backup featuring the introduction of The Establishment. If the Authority is a team working outside the system, the Establishment is the system â€” delivering super-hero action with a British attitude!
